_Blank

Business applications development platform

Rapid build of unique applications

Blank — is your development start point and great wireframe. The tool helps to get a ready solution for business. Just for few hours you can set up your data structure and get working app! Easy and deep tuning become possible with help of scenarious written in good known script language - JavaScript. Blank engine is already works for CRMs, customer order systems, ERPs and call-centers.

Reduced development cost

We have user interface ready, lot of routine data manage tasks solved. Just concentrate on business logic coding.

Buil-in IP telephony and mail

We have already connected IP telephony and tools for working with e-mail. Just enter the settings for your service providers and start using.

Fast and secure

A flexible system of access rights allocation will help to protect your data. Built-in full text search engine will deliver the quick and easy work with data.
